<a id="OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier"></a>

# OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier

**Inherits:** [OpenXRActionBindingModifier](OpenXRActionBindingModifier.md) **\<** [OpenXRBindingModifier](OpenXRBindingModifier.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

The analog threshold binding modifier can modify a float input to a boolean input with specified thresholds.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

The analog threshold binding modifier can modify a float input to a boolean input with specified thresholds.

See [XR_VALVE_analog_threshold](https://registry.khronos.org/OpenXR/specs/1.1/html/xrspec.html#XR_VALVE_analog_threshold) for in-depth details.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_off_haptic"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[OpenXRHapticBase](OpenXRHapticBase.md) **off_haptic** [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_off_haptic)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_off_haptic**\ (\ value\: [OpenXRHapticBase](OpenXRHapticBase.md)\ )
- [OpenXRHapticBase](OpenXRHapticBase.md) **get_off_haptic**\ (\ )

Haptic pulse to emit when the user releases the input.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_off_threshold"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **off_threshold** = `0.4` [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_off_threshold)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_off_threshold**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_off_threshold**\ (\ )

When our input value falls below this, our output becomes ``false``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_on_haptic"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[OpenXRHapticBase](OpenXRHapticBase.md) **on_haptic** [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_on_haptic)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_on_haptic**\ (\ value\: [OpenXRHapticBase](OpenXRHapticBase.md)\ )
- [OpenXRHapticBase](OpenXRHapticBase.md) **get_on_haptic**\ (\ )

Haptic pulse to emit when the user presses the input.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_on_threshold"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](float.md) **on_threshold** = `0.6` [ðŸ”—](#OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_on_threshold)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_on_threshold**\ (\ value\: [float](float.md)\ )
- [float](float.md) **get_on_threshold**\ (\ )

When our input value is equal or larger than this value, our output becomes ``true``. It stays ``true`` until it falls under the [off_threshold](OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier.md#OpenXRAnalogThresholdModifier_property_off_threshold) value.
